project.description: This project used to publish openeuler ccs server

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" IMAGE_VERSION="v0.0.1" PROJECT_NAME="openeuler-ccs" VERSION=$(date +%Y%m%d) #VERSION="20211220" if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker not installed." exit 1 fi if [ -d "netflix-config-server" ]; then rm -rf "netflix-config-server" 2>/dev/null fi if [ -d "netflix-config-server.zip" ]; then rm -rf "netflix-config-server.zip" 2>/dev/null fi curl -o netflix-config-server.zip -u $CCS_USER:$CCS_PASS http://117.78.18.54:9005/attach/netflix-config-server-1.0.0-$VERSION.zip unzip netflix-config-server.zip
IMAGE_VERSION=$(date +%s)
cd netflix-config-server #if hash git 2>/dev/null; then # IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short=20 HEAD) #fi #sed -i 's|openjdk-8-alpine|java:openjdk-8-alpine|g' Dockerfile docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/ccs-config:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/ccs-config:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/ccs-config:$IMAGE_VERSION
if [ -d "infra-openeuler" ]; then rm -rf "infra-openeuler" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-openeuler cd infra-openeuler/applications/openeuler-ccs else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/ccs-config=swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/ccs-config:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update image to $IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi ARGOCD_TOKEN=`curl -X POST -s -d '{"password":"'${ARGOCD_PASS}'","username":"'${ARGOCD_USER}'"}' "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/session"|tail -1 |awk -F '[""]' '{print$4}'`>/dev/null curl -X POST -s -o /dev/null --cookie "argocd.token=${ARGOCD_TOKEN}" "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/applications/${PROJECT_NAME}/sync">/dev/null if [ $? -eq 0 ];then echo "complete!" else echo "failed!" fi
